attributes.action: expel Lord Taylor of Blackburn from the House of Lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lord Taylor has been caught red handed offering to influence legislation in return for cash. This is unacceptable and in any reasonable society this man would no longer be considered a fit representative of the people. I urge the Prime Minister to act reasonably.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
